Alaris.Irc.Listener Class Reference

This class parses messages received from the IRC server and raises the appropriate event. More...

List of all members.

 Listener ()
 Create an instance ready to parse incoming messages.

 Error messages from the IRC server.

 A Sender.PrivateNotice or Sender.PrivateMessage message was sent to someone who is away.

 An Sender.Invite message was successfully sent to another user.

Detailed Description

This class parses messages received from the IRC server and raises the appropriate event.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Alaris.Irc.Listener.Listener (  ) 

Create an instance ready to parse incoming messages.
